title: Anatomy Education Curriculum Using AI-Based Virtual Manipulative Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biology and Medical Terminology
context.additional_context: Students majoring in linguistics must systematically learn anatomical terminology and structures; practical education is conducted in simulation/VR environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify 3D structures of human organs and systems using AI-based virtual manipulation tools
Learners can explain anatomical terminology and physiological functions with over 80% accuracy through interaction with ChatGPT
Learners can analyze anatomical positions and relationships via VR simulations and present at least three clinical application cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
